languages.text: Чтобы переместить корабль, кликните [ЛКМ] в любом месте на поле боя — вы увидите голограмму корабля и сможете оценить эффективность его атак и действий (так же, как при использовании голограммы в обычных боях). Повторно нажмите [ЛКМ], чтобы подтвердить свой выбор и начать движение корабля. Или кликните [ПКМ], чтобы голограмма исчезла.

To move the ship, click [LMB] on any accessible cell on the battlefield. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just as you would in regular combat. Click [LMB] again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can click [RMB] to remove the hologram.
languages.original_text: Чтобы переместить корабль, кликните [ЛКМ] в любом месте на поле боя — вы увидите голограмму корабля и сможете оценить эффективность его атак и действий (так же, как при использовании голограммы в обычных боях). Повторно нажмите [ЛКМ], чтобы подтвердить свой выбор и начать движение корабля. Или кликните [ПКМ], чтобы голограмма исчезла.

traits.locale_text: To move the ship, click [LMB] on any accessible cell on the battlefield. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just as you would in regular combat. Click [LMB] again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can click [RMB] to remove the hologram.

To move the ship, click [LMB] on any accessible cell on the battlefield. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just as you would in regular combat. Click [LMB] again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can click [RMB] to remove the hologram.

To move the ship, click [LMB] on any accessible cell on the battlefield. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just as you would in regular combat. Click [LMB] again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can click [RMB] to remove the hologram.

To move the ship, click [LMB] on any accessible cell on the battlefield. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just as you would in regular combat. Click [LMB] again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can click [RMB] to remove the hologram.

To move the ship, click [LMB] on any accessible cell on the battlefield. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just as you would in regular combat. Click [LMB] again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can click [RMB] to remove the hologram.

languages.text: 若要移动舰船，鼠标左键点击战场上可以移动的格子即可。在这之后，就像普通战斗一样，您会看到舰船的全息图像，您可以在目标位置评估接下来的攻击与行动是否合适。再次点击鼠标左键，即可命令舰船前往目标位置。您也可以按下鼠标右键来移除全系图像。
languages.original_text: To move the ship, click [LMB] on any accessible cell on the battlefield. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just as you would in regular combat. Click [LMB] again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can click [RMB] to remove the hologram.

traits.locale_text: 若要移动舰船，鼠标左键点击战场上可以移动的格子即可。在这之后，就像普通战斗一样，您会看到舰船的全息图像，您可以在目标位置评估接下来的攻击与行动是否合适。再次点击鼠标左键，即可命令舰船前往目标位置。您也可以按下鼠标右键来移除全系图像。

languages.text: 戦場のアクセス可能なセルの上で [LMB] をクリックすると、船を移動できる。そうすると船のホログラムが表示され、通常の戦闘と同じように、その位置から今後の攻撃やアクションの効率を評価することができる。もう一度 [LMB] をクリックして選択を確定することで、船に移動するよう命令することもできる。もしくは、[RMB] をクリックしてホログラムを消すこともできる。
languages.original_text: To move the ship, click [LMB] on any accessible cell on the battlefield. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just as you would in regular combat. Click [LMB] again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can click [RMB] to remove the hologram.

traits.locale_text: 戦場のアクセス可能なセルの上で [LMB] をクリックすると、船を移動できる。そうすると船のホログラムが表示され、通常の戦闘と同じように、その位置から今後の攻撃やアクションの効率を評価することができる。もう一度 [LMB] をクリックして選択を確定し、船に移動するよう命令する。もしくは、[RMB] をクリックしてホログラムを消すこともできる。

languages.text: Para mover tu nave, pulsa el [botón izquierdo del ratón] en cualquier casilla accesible del campo de batalla. Una vez lo hagas, verás un holograma de la nave que te permitirá evaluar la eficacia de los ataques y ataques futuros que lances desde esa posición como harías con el combate normal. Vuelve a pulsar el [botón izquierdo del ratón] para confirmar tu decisión y ordenar a la nave que se mueva. Alternativamente, pulsa el [botón derecho del ratón] para quitar el holograma.
languages.original_text: To move the ship, click [LMB] on any accessible cell on the battlefield. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just as you would in regular combat. Click [LMB] again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can click [RMB] to remove the hologram.

traits.locale_text: Para mover tu nave, pulsa el [botón izquierdo del ratón] en cualquier casilla accesible del campo de batalla. Una vez lo hagas, verás un holograma de la nave que te permitirá evaluar la eficacia de los ataques y ataques futuros que lances desde esa posición como harías con el combate normal. Vuelve a pulsar el [botón izquierdo del ratón] para confirmar tu decisión y ordenar a la nave que se mueva. Alternativamente, pulsa el [botón derecho del ratón] para quitar el holograma.

languages.text: Zur Bewegung des Schiffes, wählst du ein zugängliches Feld auf dem Schlachtfeld und klickst mit [LMB]. Daraufhin siehst du ein Hologramm des Schiffes, mit dem du die Effizienz zukünftiger Angriffe und Aktionen von dieser Position aus beurteilen kannst, genau wie im normalen Kampf. Klicke zur Bestätigung mit [LMB], um deine Auswahl zu bestätigen und dem Schiff zu befehlen, sich zu bewegen. Alternativ kannst du das Hologramm auf mit [RMB] entfernen.
languages.original_text: To move the ship, click [LMB] on any accessible cell on the battlefield. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just as you would in regular combat. Click [LMB] again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can click [RMB] to remove the hologram.

traits.locale_text: Zur Bewegung des Schiffes, wählst du ein zugängliches Feld auf dem Schlachtfeld und klickst mit der [LMB]. Daraufhin siehst du ein Hologramm des Schiffes, mit dem du die Effizienz zukünftiger Angriffe und Aktionen von dieser Position aus beurteilen kannst, genau wie im normalen Kampf. Klicke zur Bestätigung mit der [LMB], um deine Auswahl zu bestätigen und dem Schiff zu befehlen, sich zu bewegen. Alternativ kannst du das Hologramm auf mit der [RMB] entfernen.

languages.text: Pour déplacer le vaisseau, cliquez avec le [BGS] sur une case accessible du champ de bataille. Vous verrez alors apparaître un hologramme du vaisseau qui vous permettra d'évaluer l'efficacité de vos futures attaques et actions à partir de cette position, comme vous le feriez lors d'un combat classique. Cliquez une nouvelle fois sur le [BGS] pour confirmer votre choix et ordonner au vaisseau de se déplacer. Vous pouvez également cliquer avec le [BDS] pour masquer l'hologramme.
languages.original_text: To move the ship, click [LMB] on any accessible cell on the battlefield. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just as you would in regular combat. Click [LMB] again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can click [RMB] to remove the hologram.

traits.locale_text: Pour déplacer le vaisseau, cliquez avec le [BGS] sur une case accessible du champ de bataille. Vous verrez alors apparaître un hologramme du vaisseau qui vous permettra d'évaluer l'efficacité de vos futures attaques et actions à partir de cette position, comme vous le feriez lors d'un combat classique. Cliquez une nouvelle fois sur le [BGS] pour confirmer votre choix et ordonner au vaisseau de se déplacer. Vous pouvez également cliquer avec le [BDS] pour masquer l'hologramme.

languages.text: Gemini hareket ettirmek için, çatışma alanındaki erişilebilir bir hücreye sol fare tuşuyla tıkla. Bunu yaptığında, geminin bir hologramını göreceksin. Bu sayede tıpkı normal çatışmalarda olduğu gibi, o pozisyondan yapacağın gelecekteki saldırı ve eylemlerin etkililiğini ölçebilirsin. Seçimini onaylayarak gemiye hareket etme komutu vermek için tekrar sol fare tuşuna bas. Ayrıca, sağ fare tuşuna tıklayarak hologramı kaldırabilirsin.
languages.original_text: To move the ship, click [LMB] on any accessible cell on the battlefield. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just as you would in regular combat. Click [LMB] again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can click [RMB] to remove the hologram.
